title: Planting Trees in Botheram
description: We want to plant new trees in the Botheram region
body: Restoration of parts of the 500 year-old bridge near Zuidpark in Amsterdam. There are about 399 bricks need to be replaced to make it safe again to pedestrians. This has over 900 pedestrians crossing daily and each of them has 11% chance of tripping over a loose brick and fall. Over the last year, over 99 reported cases of people tripping over this unsafe bridge. Currently, it has been closed until it is made safe again. If no one comes forward to help, this bridge will remain close and create inconvenience to pedestrians travelling from Zuidpark towards city center.

comments.author: Sito Veracruz
comments.body: This is a GREAT idea, the budget is low, the impact is high, the amount of people involved is a lot. Why not expanding this in other areas? Anyone?

author: Pasquale Muscettola

title: Converting an old warehouse to a Pop Podium
description: We want to convert the old ware house in Amsterdam Zuid to a pop podium
body: In Amsterdam Zuid there is an old warehouse that has not been used for years and crackers have found their way in. At the same time, the youth in the area have expressed a desire to have a pop podium were they can display their talents and listen to what the local scene has to offer. That’s why we want to convert the old ware house in Amsterdam Zuid to a pop podium, so that these two problems will be solved at the same time.
author: Amsterdam Zuid Neighborood

title: New hanging bridge for kids in Vondelpark
description: Why not having a nice new open-air space in Vondelpark area?
body: Vondelpark has beautiful parkland, wonderful wooden play equipment, rope bridges, zip wires, an open-air theatre, huge paddling pool, skate hire, a Picasso sculpture and a cracking café, too. Families can grab coffee and pancakes from the Groot Melkhuis, this is the place to relax and let kids run wild. There is a large lake in the middle of the lake which we feel needs a hanging bridge so that children can walk across and enjoy the lovely green lush of fresh water views, plants, birds and other reptiles. They can enjoy a nice nature walk across this bridge.
author: Pasquale Muscettola

title: Youths hang out area at Oud-West
description: We need a new hangout are for our kids! Tourist have a bad influence on them
body: There are over 844,000 inhabitants in Amsterdam and 45% of them are below 21.  These youths need a safe and relaxing place to hangout and take a break during their school holidays. These kids have nowhere to go and we would like to create a safe place for them. We have identified a house owner who is willing to offer the place during weekends for this hangout place. We just need to perform paintings, purchase new games, equipments and furniture to make this place conducive to hangout.

comments.author: Frank Nack
comments.body: It is of outmost importance in my opinion, why not having this funded?

comments.author: Sito Veracruz
comments.body: We could use some funding, yes!

author: Pasquale Muscettola

title: BBQ for the whole neighborhood
description: We will have a BBQ to celebrate
body: The community has done a good job working together so far, and this has to be rewarded. For this reason, a BBQ will be organized so the whole neighborhood can have a nice piece of meat, and it will also help to improve the social cohesion in the neighborhood, bringing down crime in the process.
author: Fikke & Fokkei

title: Graffiti removal in Einsteinsweg
description: The project aims to remove graffiti in Einsteinsweg
body: Over the years, a lot of vandals have sprayed graffiti on various buildings in Amsterdam West, most notable in the Einsteinweg. With this project, we would like to remove all the graffiti from the buildings, so the whole area will have a clean look again
author: Neighborood Einsteinsweg

title: Activities for the elderly people
description: We will organize an activity for elderly every month, so they will have an opportunity to socialize with other people.
body: There are a lot of elderly people in Amsterdam who are very lonely. Out of 4.1 million people in the Netherlands who are 55 years or older, 1 million of them are reported to have feelings of loneliness. The same relative numbers can be applied to Amsterdam. To make this situation a little better, a comity has been put up that will organize an activity for elderly every month, so they will have an opportunity to socialize with other people.
author: Nienke Stoijpers

title: Car Sharing Project
description: We would like to supply a number of cars which are especially for sharing, so that work goers can be a lot more environment friendly
body: When traveling to work, many people go by car by themselves, and because of this, there are a lot of cars driving around with just one person in it, and a lot of empty seats. Also, lots of people don’t have access to a car themselves. In this project, we would like to supply a number of cars which are especially for sharing, so that work goers can be a lot more environment friendly, and also be more social with each other in the process.
author: Fikke & Fokkei
